title: In The Eye of The Storm: A Novel of the Phantom of the Opera
description: San Francisco, 1948When a mysterious stranger approaches Clarice Kaye in her favorite restaurant, his words trigger a voyage of discovery: “You look just like your grandmother, but you have your mother’s eyes.”There was only one question in Clarice’s mind: how could he know?Armed with family diaries that tell of the scandalous grandmother for whom she was named, Clarice embarks on a journey through Paris’ modern art movement, 1906 San Francisco, and the depths of the Opéra Garnier in this long-awaited sequel to “In The Eye of The Beholder.”
author: Sharon E. Cathcart
